last_episode_to_air.name: The Road to Best in Japan
last_episode_to_air.overview: At the Combined Cup, Anne breezes through the preliminaries. Once the preliminaries are over with, it is revealed that the Hanamiya girls have made it to the finals. However, they notice that they are second in the team rankings behind Anne's team. Anne is confident the Hanamiya girls will not beat her.

name: Iwa Kakeru! Sport Climbing Girls
original_name: いわかける！ - Sport Climbing Girls -
overview: Sport climbing is a sport that makes use of both the body and the brain to climb walls. Kasahara Konomi, a master at puzzles, just happens to discover her school’s climbing wall, and it looks almost like a colorful sort of puzzle in her eyes. This fateful encounter brings big changes to Konomi’s life! With her teammates in the Hanamiya Girls’ High School Climbing Club, Konomi races for the top in this passionate climbing story!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A genius gamer with a knack for solving puzzles finds her true calling when she joins her high school's competitive sport climbing team.

episodes.name: Rocky Puzzle
episodes.overview: Now in high school, Kasahara Konomi’s looking for a club to join when she finds a climbing wall on campus.

episodes.name: Believe in Yourself
episodes.overview: Konomi suddenly finds herself making her competitive debut at the Spring Climbing Championships, and she’s willing to take any advice…?

episodes.name: The Anti-Monkey Rock
episodes.overview: According to the captain, Sayo, Konomi’s problem is a lack of fitness, which can be solved by a training regimen that includes climbing a rather notorious rock…

episodes.name: Powerhouse Climbers
episodes.overview: Now with more stamina and strength, Konomi goes back to get her revenge on the Anti-Monkey Rock before the Kanto Championships begin.

episodes.name: Hard Work and Talent
episodes.overview: The Kanto Bouldering Championship begins, and Nono’s unusually down on her chances this time around.

episodes.name: Unbelievable Ability
episodes.overview: The Kanto Bouldering Championships enter the semifinal stage, which brings with it its own set of challenges, but it might actually be right down Konomi's alley...?

episodes.name: Failure of a Climber
episodes.overview: Konomi's impressive performance gives Hanamiya a real shot at victory. Can Jun follow up?

episodes.name: Tears of Disappointment
episodes.overview: Following Konomi and Jun's showing, Sayo feels the need to put Hanamiya on her back as its captain. Meanwhile, can Konomi keep going?

episodes.name: The Princess of Climbing
episodes.overview: Konomi has built up a resume for herself by entering competitions left and right. And in the latest one, she runs into Anne, who has an unexpected proposal.

episodes.name: Restart!
episodes.overview: The Hanamiya girls meet up at a speed wall for their speed climbing training. After Jun explains the rules of speed climbing to Konomi, she completes the climb where she learns that she needs to analyze the nitty-gritty before she can improve her time. Sayo later tells Konomi about a multi-school speed training camp. Konomi and Jun arrive at the camp where they encounter Akane, Kurea, and Maruno.

episodes.name: The 15 Second Wall
episodes.overview: Konomi approaches the climber to ask what she focuses on while she is climbing. The climber, whose name is Mimu Takahashi, explains that she focuses on rhythm games. Inspired, Konomi uses her analytic skills to train. The next day, Konomi takes on Kurea in a race.

episodes.name: The Road to Best in Japan
episodes.overview: At the Combined Cup, Anne breezes through the preliminaries. Once the preliminaries are over with, it is revealed that the Hanamiya girls have made it to the finals. However, they notice that they are second in the team rankings behind Anne's team. Anne is confident the Hanamiya girls will not beat her.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A genius gamer with a knack for solving puzzles finds her true calling when she joins her high school's competitive sport climbing team.
